text: Julio Victorio De Rissio (10 November 1916 - 26 December 2013), or Dr. Tangalanga, was a famous Argentine comedian, actor and writer. He was known for his prank phone calls to people who were not expecting it. Tangalanga was born in Buenos Aires. His career began in 1964. Tangalanga died in Buenos Aires from natural causes. He was aged 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website *90 Tangalangas *"Tal vez ya sea un poco conocido" *Argentina answers to the crazy call of Dr. Tangalanga, Matt Moffett. Wall Street Journal. December 15, 2007. Category:1916 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine comedians Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Dr. Tangalanga
